name: Fleur de Sel - Premium Sea salt from Guerande France - Flaky Sea Salt from the Celtic Sea - Salt Cork box - 3.5 Oz (100g)
short_description: ✔️ AUTHENTIC HAND HARVESTED SALT: Tablissima french sea salt is carefully harvested by hand from the surface of salt ponds in the Guérande region of France. Centuries-old harvesting techniques are used to harvest a 100% natural salt that will provide a delicate taste to your food and make every bite delicious.

✔️ ARTISANAL SEA SALT: Our Guérande Fleur de Sel is classified as IGP (Protected Geographical Indication), which guarantees you its origin, its natural production method and it's harvesting techniques. Our salt comes from a production with no pesticides, nor herbicides, no fossil nor carbon Energy.

✔️ CAVIAR OF SALT: This finishing salt is loved by the best culinary professionals. Rich in minerals and lower in sodium than regular salt, it will give a delicate and subtle taste to any of your favourite dishes.

✔️ MADE IN FRANCE: Our sea salt is harvested on the salt marshes of Guérande in France. Delicately picked from the surface of the water, it’s neither washed nor treated and drips naturally on our salt flats. Trusted by the best Chefs.

✔️ PREMIUM CORK BOX : Our Fleur de Sel sea salt comes in a premium carton box with a cork lid produced in France. The eco-friendly cardboard packaging and decorative cork lid make it a beautiful addition to any kitchen.
product_description: Fleur de Sel is a hand harvested and premium sea salt that is flaky and delicate. It has a beautiful flavor that is perfect for finishing dishes. Because it is hand harvested, it is a rare and luxurious salt that elevates any dish to gourmet status. Fleur de Sel is a type of sea salt that is hand harvested in France. It is delicate and flaky, with a beautiful flavor that makes it perfect for finishing dishes. Because it is hand harvested, Fleur de Sel is a rare and luxurious salt that elevates any dish to gourmet status. Fleur de Sel derives its name from the French words "fleur" meaning flower and "sel" meaning salt. This sea salt gets its delicate texture and exquisite flavor from being hand-harvested in Brittany, France. The unique climate and mineral-rich soil of this region create the ideal conditions for harvesting this Finishing Salt, which can only be found in limited quantities due to its rarity. Adding just a pinch of Fleur de Sel to your dish will elevate the flavors present, providing an elegant finish not possible with other salts.

name: Jacobsen Salt Co. Pure Flake Sea Salt – Kosher Salt, Coarse, Non-Iodized Made in USA, Non-GMO, Steak Seasoning, Gourmet, Real Salt Flakes – 4oz
short_description: FANCY & FLAVORFUL – Our flake salt is bright & briny with a delicate crunch. It’s the perfect flaky sea salt for finishing gourmet meals & wowing guests. Try our sea salt flakes today!

THE SALT THAT STARTED IT ALL – Our flake finishing salt gets its bright salinity from a slow evaporation process that yields pure, naturally formed salt crystals. Perfect for any dish, savory or sweet
HAND-HARVESTED – Unlike Celtic sea salts, our salts derive from Netarts Bay, Oregon, where we sift every flake to perfection – large crystals become our flake salt & smaller ones become kosher salts
FOR NOVICES & PROFESSIONAL CHEFS – A great gift for your favorite chef, or for gifting at dinner parties with family & friends during the holidays. Create memories & tasty meals with Jacobsen Salts

OUR MISSION – Provide the finest cooking ingredients & kitchen staples that inspire people to cook, eat, & live well, every day. Explore our variety of pure & infused sea salts, raw honey & seasonings

name: Maldon Salt, Sea Salt Flakes, 20 oz (570 g), Resealable Tub – Kosher, Natural, Unique Gourmet Pyramid Shaped Salt Flakes, Perfect for a Wide Range of Dishes, Hand-Harvested for Four Generations
short_description: PREMIUM QUALITY - Our soft, crunchy sea salt flakes contain the perfect balance of natural minerals, offering a fresh intensity and clean taste to enhance any dish. The 570g mid-sized catering tub is ideal for kitchens with a little more space.

ARTISANAL HERITAGE - Four generations of Master Salt Makers have been hand-harvesting Maldon's sea salt flakes, using the same simple, time-honoured techniques. A symbol of artisanal quality and craftsmanship since 1882.
FLAKE TEXTURE - The unique pyramid-shaped salt flakes are characteristics of Maldon Salt, recognised the world over as the finest of sea salts.

VERSATILE USE - Maldon Sea Salt flakes are a highly versatile ingredient that can be used at any point in the cooking process. Perfect for a wide range of dishes, from seasonal vegetables and grilled meats, to sweet desserts. Our sea salt flakes bring fantastic flavour to any recipe.

MALDON SALT - We have over 140 years of artisanal heritage, yet we are always looking forward with excitement and passion, to continue to inspire imagination and create special moments at the heart of the table.

name: Falksalt - Natural Sea Salt Flakes, Light & Crunchy Gourmet Sea Salt Flakes for Cooking, Baking, & Finishing (3.3 lb)
short_description: GOURMET SEA SALT FLAKES: This premium finishing salt is made from natural sea water of the Mediterranean off the coast of Cyprus, with no anti-caking agents or fillers.

FINISHING SALT FOR ANY DISH: These natural sea salt flakes are ideal for steaks, seafood, vegetables, eggs, salads, baked goods, or even a cocktail. The color and scent of the flakes add an extra flourish to every dish.

LIGHT & CRUNCHY: Delicate, airy salt flakes dissolve easily while delivering a satisfying crunch. This sea salt dissolves more slowly than your regular table salt and triggers pleasant sparks each time a flake hits your tongue.
CRAFTED FLAKES: Harvested using artisan methods that allow salt crystals to form into delicate pyramid-shaped flakes, creating consistent size, clean flavor, and refined finishing performance.
SWEDISH TRADITION: Rooted in Swedish craftsmanship since 1928, Falksalt brings generations of salt expertise and a passion for exceptional flavor to every product.
